entry.def: Broadband is a method of sending many electronic messages at the same time, using a wide range of frequencies.

example.ex: The two companies said they planned to develop new broadband services for customers in the UK...
example.tran: 两家公司声称他们计划为英国的客户开发新的宽带服务。

example.ex: As we move into broadband, a wide range of e-commerce services will become available.
example.tran: 我们转入宽频传输领域后，将会提供多种电子商务服务。

means.word_mean: 1. of or relating to or being a communications network in which the bandwidth can be divided and shared by multiple simultaneous signals (as for voice or data or video)
2. responding to or operating at a wide band of frequencies;
